channel.title: Can't Play Frisbee in School
channel.description:
Today, while me and a few friends were playing Frisbee a teacher came out and took them our Frisbee away. They also said it was against the rules and it was in the head book "a lie"..... It gets even better, our school allows Hacky Sack and ninja both games are far worse then just tossing a Frisbee around.... One last thing, after the day was over I was able to get it back, then the principle who has gone by us god knows how many times while we were just playing Frisbee said nothing and just walk on, also he has even talked with us, not about the Frisbee but other stuff and said nothing about it still, and when I come to pick it up he is like "Frisbees aren't allowed on school property...." and then he said it is in the hand book...
What do you think, also does your school ban things that actually give you exercise?

item.title: Can't Play Frisbee in School
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:46, topic:394027”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=491214.msg3596367#msg3596367 date=1305131114]
did you honestly expect them to let you do this?
[/quote]

I would expect them to allow it, unless they were playing too near cars or something. When I was in school, it was even mandatory that we play ultimate frisbee. There’s far worse things that people can do then toss a frisbee around.

This is why kids are growing up to be whiney depressed whimps.[/quote]Same, schools these days have just got too out of hand.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't Play Frisbee in School
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:44, topic:394027”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=491214.msg3596712#msg3596712 date=1305163299]

[quote author=jmood128 link=topic=491214.msg3596638#msg3596638 date=1305157548]

Be rebellious while you can, cause when you become an adult, you won’t be able to.
[/quote]Juvenile Detention

that’s all im gun say

JK

Really, why do you need to play frisbee at school? Walk to the nearest park where it’s allowed, did you honestly expect them to let you do this?

Maybe because we can’t leave campus…
[/quote]Ever? I mean after school hours, you know, when you’re supposed to not be in school

Yes me and my friends are going to play Frisbee after school hour when most of them have a job… Or it takes them an hour to get home like me…[/quote]

Then what are you doing playing Frisbee anyway?

But this time I got a bit pissed so I spartan kicked his ass and he face planted, THEN the teacher steps in. Not when this guy tried to sexually abuse me but when I kicked him for what he deserved. Fucking teachers these days
